\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 53344}

\subsection*{Sick Doctor}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Lorenzo}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Guarana & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 65.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I am italian, and in italy Ritalin is not very popular as in USA. But I tried to make my doctor prescribe me some Ritalin pills for my tiredness. I described him all the symptoms of tiredness (I am very very tired) and care of attenction, but the old bastard gave me guaran√† pills O\_o.



Well, he told me to take 3 pills a day, but I soon doubled the dosage because I didn't feel anything. I felt nothing with 6, so one day I had to do a lot of gymnastics and took 15 of them (or more, don't remember). It only made me nervous, not any stimulant effect, and the next day I had an horrible pain in my belly. My doctor is a sick motherfucker.

\end{document}
